add_facet.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_ADD_FACET_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_ADD_FACET_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // add_facet.hpp
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2003 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com .

00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 #include <locale>
00020 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00022 
00023 // does STLport uses native STL for locales?
00024 #if (defined(__SGI_STL_PORT)&& defined(_STLP_NO_OWN_IOSTREAMS))
00025 // and this native STL lib is old Dinkumware (has not defined _CPPLIB_VER)
00026 #  if (defined(_YVALS) && !defined(__IBMCPP__)) || !defined(_CPPLIB_VER)
00027 #    define BOOST_ARCHIVE_OLD_DINKUMWARE_BENEATH_STLPORT
00028 #  endif
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 namespace boost { 
00032 namespace archive {
00033 
00034 template<class Facet>
00035 inline std::locale * 
00036 add_facet(const std::locale &l, Facet * f){
00037     return
00038         #if defined BOOST_ARCHIVE_OLD_DINKUMWARE_BENEATH_STLPORT 
00039             // std namespace used for native locale
00040             new std::locale(std::_Addfac(l, f));
00041         #elif BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_DINKUMWARE_STDLIB, == 1) // old Dinkumwar
00042             // std namespace used for native locale
00043             new std::locale(std::_Addfac(l, f));
00044         #else
00045             // standard compatible
00046             new std::locale(l, f);
00047         #endif
00048 }
00049 
00050 } // namespace archive
00051 } // namespace boost
00052 
00053 #undef BOOST_ARCHIVE_OLD_DINKUMWARE_BENEATH_STLPORT
00054 
00055 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_ADD_FACET_HPP
